Homomorphisms of digraphs
The following methods exist to find homomorphisms between digraphs. If an argument to one of these methods is a digraph with multiple edges, then the multiplicity of edges will be ignored in order to perform the calculation; the digraph will be treated as if it has no multiple edges.
<#Include Label="HomomorphismDigraphsFinder"> <#Include Label="DigraphHomomorphism"> <#Include Label="HomomorphismsDigraphs"> <#Include Label="DigraphMonomorphism"> <#Include Label="MonomorphismsDigraphs"> <#Include Label="DigraphEpimorphism"> <#Include Label="EpimorphismsDigraphs"> <#Include Label="GeneratorsOfEndomorphismMonoid"> <#Include Label="DigraphColouring"> <#Include Label="DigraphEmbedding"> <#Include Label="ChromaticNumber">
